snippet: “Girl With a Pearl Earring” is one of 15 paintings going to the Frick for “Vermeer, Rembrandt and Hals.”
abstract: Carol Vogel Inside Art column; Girl With a Pearl Earring is one of 15 paintings going to the Frick for Vermeer, Rembrandt and Hals exhibit; Sterling and Francine Clark Art Institute in Williamston, Mass, opens The Other Side of Art exhibit showing the hidden sides of works; Greenberg Van Doren gallery in New York City shuts its doors.
lead_paragraph: “Girl With a Pearl Earring” is one of 15 paintings going to the Frick for “Vermeer, Rembrandt and Hals.”

headline.seo: Vermeer’s ‘Girl With a Pearl Earring’ at Frick Collection
headline.main: A Room to Herself for a Vermeer Girl
headline.print_headline: A Room to Herself For a Vermeer Girl
